summary: This document is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys discussing and editing a draft letter regarding a defense request related to the MDC warden. It shows internal DOJ coordination on a procedural matter in the Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Bobbi
persons.context: The source of a statement that the draft letter quotes regarding the defense request about the MDC warden.

connections.description: M is drafting a letter that includes a direct quote from Bobbi regarding a defense request.

events.title: Drafting of Letter re MDC Warden
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorney M drafts a letter regarding a defense request related to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) warden and circulates it for edits among colleagues.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is internal DOJ correspondence from December 1, 2020, regarding the Epstein/Maxwell case.
The subject is a draft letter concerning a defense request related to the warden of the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
The draft includes a direct quote from an individual named Bobbi, which the attorneys discuss making clearer as a quotation.
The correspondence shows procedural coordination among Assistant U.S. Attorneys in the Southern District of New York.
